Windlord:

"I see"said camly the male but inside him looked carefully at 
Megatron, he didn't like a lot that evil grin that he had


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> "Erragggh," the clone said with a scowl.
> To think such an abmoination was here, now.  He has to die.  That 
was the only solution.  Hydras was a dead bot walking.
> "We had... an altercation.  Nothing to worry about."
> Megatron crossed his arms across his massive chest.  He looked 
down on Organics and Windlord with an evil grin, and he chuckled.  
He was going to have fun with his step sister's new boyfriend, oh 
yes.
